Posts.Content: Kristina19 wrote: Has anyone had the Intraoperative Radiation therapy and if yes, what side effects did you experience?  I am considering this after lumpectomy but am scared of all radiation.   Kristina Brown Dx 7/22/2012, IDC, 1cm, Stage I, Grade 1, ER+/PR+, HER2- Surgery 9/4/2012 Lumpectomy: Left; Lymph node removal: Left, Sentinel Surgery 9/20/2012 Lumpectomy: Left Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: IORT Radiation Kristina19 emkittie

Posts.Content: Aug 29, 2012 05:18AM Kristina19 wrote: HI Chelsea, Thanks for sharing your experience with IORT.  I decided before seeing your posts to forgo the procedure.  there were too many unknowns for me the more I investigated it.  Also my insurarnce company would not cover the procedure so am now having a lumpectomy with SNB and some form of radiation after that.  I am hoping that I can have partial breast radiation but will have to wait to see the final path report.  I am so sorry that you have had such bad side effects from your surgery and IORT. Kristina
Posts.Title: IORT Radiation Kristina19 emkittie
